embeds.title: Karting Microgame
embeds.description: The Karting Microgame Template is a 3D kart racing game that you can mod and customize. Complete the Creative Mods to build on the project and make it more your own, while learning the basics of Unity. Viewing from the Learn tab in the Unity Hub? Click Download Project > Open Project to automatically open it in Unity. Viewing from the Unity Learn website? Simply go to the Learn tab in the Unity Hub and search for this Microgame, or manually import it via the Asset Store link below.

fields.name: Check out the link below to watch the video:
